Package com.floppa.Entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.floppa.Entity.Entity
com.floppa.Entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Class for creating a playable Character

  • Constructor Summary

    Player (Info info, Room room, Floppa floppa)
    Sets the Info, so the Name and Description of the Player Sets its current Position to default Sets the Starting Room as the Current Room and sets a Floppa
